summary: Integration test suite that verifies Conan's QBS toolchain correctly processes package dependencies, components, options, settings, and pkg-config names, and that the generated QBS profile accurately reflects compiler options, sysroot paths, toolchain configurations, and environment overrides.
business_intent: Validate that Conan can reliably generate QBS build files and profiles for C/C++ projects, ensuring proper handling of dependency graphs and toolchain settings to prevent build failures in downstream QBS builds.
